extendedInfo.description: Download custom keyboard skins featuring the webhead as seen in the blockbuster movie and test out your heroic typing ability!These unique skins feature your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man in dynamic poses under the letters and symbols of your deviceâs keyboard. Also, an easy to access button on the customized keyboard skin allows you to toggle and choose which skin you would like to âassistâ you in all your typing needs for the day.So team up with your favorite wallcrawler from Marvel Comics, and download The Amazing Spider-Man Keyboard Skins today!NOTE: Please follow these instruction to set the keyboard skin:1. Go into 'settings'2. Go into 'Language and input'3. Select 'Spider-Man'4. Go to an option that utilizes the keyboard and select the text field - You will see a keyboard icon display in your notification section5. Select 'Select input method'6. Switch it to 'Spider-Man keyboards'

reviews.title: update needed
reviews.comment: Needs caps and caplock option, button does not become highlighted when caps lock is on, there is no cap enage option when capitalizing a single letter, needs suggestive spelling. does not capitalize first letter after period punctuation
reviews.author: Bryant Ratlief

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: As awesome as this is, this could do with some changes, to make it technically identical to the phone-specific keyboard, including usual punctutation doodie-whatsits. On a whole, though, this is brilliant!

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: But I have only one concern. There seems to be a little lag when I type & auto-correct does not work. Capitalization is another small problem. I have to manually switch between all caps & lower case lettering, where as the default keyboard on my phone is not as laggy or have an issue with the previously stated minor setbacks. Otherwise is a very well done app, it actually has more symbols than my default keyboard which, as a college student and constant mobile phone user, I appreciate.
